rules_text:
Trample
[i]Tide Turning Mercenary[/i] – Whenever Priam, Lost Hero attacks, he explores. If you reveal a land card this way, draw a card. If you don't, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
[i]Relic Wielder[/i] – Equip costs you pay cost {1} less to activate.
[i]Timeless [/i]– Your maximum hand size is increased to thirteen.
